channel.title: [URGENT] Help with Auto Cache Downloader

item.title: [URGENT] Help with Auto Cache Downloader
item.dc:creator: @CreativeX CreativeX
item.description:
@CreativeX wrote:

Help me out here? It’s user.home and I’m on windows, not a mac, what should I edit?
Also do I change /.SX_V7.0 to the name I want the cache to be?

public static final String findcachedir() { boolean exists = (new File(System.getProperty("user.home") + "/.SX_V7.0")).exists(); if (exists) { //System.out.println("Directory exists"); return System.getProperty("user.home") + "/.SX_V7.0/"; } else { File f = new File(System.getProperty("user.home") + "/.SX_V7.0/"); f.mkdir(); System.out.println("Directory doesnt exist, making directory"); return System.getProperty("user.home") + "/.SX_V7.0/"; } }

Thanks!

  • Nathan

Read full topic
